verse:
चित्तमेव हि संसारो रागादिक्लेशदूषितम्।
तदेव तैर्विनिर्मुक्तं भवान्त इति कथ्यते ॥

terms.संसारः: (m.) samsara, the cycle of birth and death
terms.रागादि: (m.) attachments and desires (like attachment, desire, anger etc.)
terms.तैः: (pron.) by them (referring to attachments, desires, etc.)

meaning: The mind itself is indeed samsara, contaminated by attachments and other afflictions. It is said that you all are freed by those very attachments and desires.
